column1: House Vote #11 1789-08-21T00:00:00 - TO AMEND THE CONSTITUTIONAL RESOLUTION; BY ADDING A CLAUSE PROHIBITING CONGRESS FROM INTERFERING IN THE TIMES
column3: OR MANNER OF HOLDING ELECTIONS OF SENATORS OR REPRESENTATIVES
column4: EXCEPT WHEN ANY STATE SHALL REFUSE
column5: NEGLECT OR BE UNABLE TO HOLD AN ELECTION DUE TO INVASION OR REBELLION.
